thread.title: Chanelle Hayes is pregnant after worries her yo-yo dieting from size 8 to 18 left her infertile
thread.title_full: Chanelle Hayes is pregnant after worries her yo-yo dieting from size 8 to 18 left her infertile

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Chanelle Hayes is pregnant after worries her yo-yo dieting from size 8 to 18 left her infertile
text:
Chanelle Hayes talks extreme weight gain and diabetes scare Share this video Watch Next Chanelle worried her weight struggles had affected her fertility (Photo: Rex Features) 
The former glamour model is known for her yo-yo dieting and after piling on the pounds yet again hosts Holly and Phil asked their guest if she was simply after a fitness DVD as she appeared on the show today. 
"Who took the photos?" asked an unconvinced Holly as pictures of Chanelle in a bikini flashed on screen. "They look very close up. The pictures are very clear." 
Phillip added: "I suppose it doesn't help matters when you tweet saying 'If someone offered me a DVD deal I would jump at the chance'." Chanelle Hayes talks about her weight gain (Photo: ITV) 
Despite the intense questioning, Chanelle insisted that her weight gain was unintentional. 
"With the amount of money I've spent on pizzas and doughnuts, even if I did make a DVD I don't think I could break even," she claimed. 
These days Chanelle seems happier than ever with her new fuller figure but it hasn't always been the case. 
Just two years ago she admitted: "If I carried on the way I was going, I could end up dead." 
Chanelle credited the new man in her life for helping her body confidence - revealing he's a teacher called Ryan. 
The pair met on Tinder, and while they haven't been dating for long, she admitted she's smitten. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
